docs.lead_paragraph: Can one night change your life? Bobby, a young New York pickpocket who must reevaluate a lifetime of missteps when the girl of his dreams announces her pregnancy following their passionate one-night affair.
docs.snippet: Can one night change your life? Bobby, a young New York pickpocket who must reevaluate a lifetime of missteps when the girl of his dreams announces her pregnancy following their passionate one-night affair.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Met’s recent performances of “La Traviata” and “Aida” showcased both the potential pitfalls and the triumphs that await young Americans singing Verdi.

headline.seo: Stephen Costello and Tamara Wilson Show Opposing Approaches
headline.main: When Singing Verdi, Perfection Is No Substitute for Passion
headline.print_headline: When Singing Verdi, Perfection Is No Substitute for Passion

docs.abstract: Zachary Woolfe Critic's Notebook notes rising tenor Stephen Costello's performance in Metropolitan Opera production of Verdi opera La Traviata, in which he sings role of Alfredo, is both perfect and devoid of passion.
docs.snippet: The Met’s recent performances of “La Traviata” and “Aida” showcased both the potential pitfalls and the triumphs that await young Americans singing Verdi.

docs.lead_paragraph: Jim Mahoney parted with a tiny piece of U.S. Open history with hopes it could change Phil Mickelson's luck.

headline.main: A Year in Golf: Tales From the Tour
headline.print_headline: A Year in Golf: Tales From the Tour

docs.snippet: Jim Mahoney parted with a tiny piece of U.S. Open history with hopes it could change Phil Mickelson's luck.

docs.lead_paragraph: A poor state with a starkly unhealthy populace, Kentucky is becoming a symbol of the Affordable Health Care Act’s potential, and its obstacles.

headline.main: Success of Kentucky’s Health Plan Comes With New Obstacles
headline.print_headline: Success of Kentucky’s Health Plan Comes With New Obstacles

docs.abstract: Kentucky faces problems with Affordable Care Act that are extreme example of nationwide issues; poor state with largely unhealthy populous has seen sharp rise in Medicaid rolls since choosing to expand program though few have signed up for private insurance (Series: Remaking Medicine).
docs.snippet: A poor state with a starkly unhealthy populace, Kentucky is becoming a symbol of the Affordable Health Care Act’s potential, and its obstacles.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: California public health officials issued an alert Monday after finding "very strong evidence" that an adult film actor became infected with HIV as a result of unprotected sex on an out-of-state film shoot.

headline.main: Alert Issued After Likely HIV Porn Set Infection
headline.print_headline: Alert Issued After Likely HIV Porn Set Infection

docs.snippet: California public health officials issued an alert Monday after finding "very strong evidence" that an adult film actor became infected with HIV as a result of unprotected sex on an out-of-state film shoot.
